name: db_gitignore_guard
summary: Prevent DB artifacts from entering git by updating .gitignore and untracking staged db files.
steps: Ensure .gitignore contains patterns for *.db, *.db-shm, *.db-wal and data/foundups.db*
Untrack any staged db artifacts (git rm --cached --ignore-unmatch data/foundups.db*)
Warn and block if oversized files remain (handled in caller)

outputs.details: description of actions taken or why blocked
